name: Sumedha Arora
tagline: Budding Software Developer and Data Science Enthusiast
body:
# Sumedha Arora Hi, I am a recent Software Engineering Graduate from Delhi Technological University (formerly Delhi College of Engineering ). This page contains a description of all the projects I have done over the past 4 years. My main areas of interest are Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning and Data Analytics.

### My Projects
#### Real-Time Sentiment Analysis of Twitter Data
#### Disambiguation of Named Entities in news articles
#### Monitoring and Management of Enterprise Applications using JMX
#### Result Management System (currently being used at DTU)
#### Text Classification System
### Contact Checkout my Linkedin profile here : http://lnkd.in/B9PiHx
I can be contacted through email here : sumedha.arora0@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
